From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/Minion/Chaos/Sixshot/Unitron/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh 
Ripper/Serpentor:




Dark One activated his weapons systems, making a strafing run, firing down 25 
rapid laser bolts at Rizopas.

---

Breakdown fired off another shell at Blender.

---

Pyro ducked, the missile dragging flames into Pyro's face.  But the 
pyromaniac didn't care, flames were his friends!  Transforming to his black 
tank mode, he fired off two fire balls at Rizopas.

---

Hiss fired off three fusion blasts at Stronghold's chest.

---

Scavenger fired three optic blasts at one charge, but the other one landed 
near him, sending him flying through the air, slamming into the ground.

---

Demon Wulf ignored damage from the autoguns.  He pointed his sword at the 
base, the blade blasting off, now a missile, heading for the base, the blade 
quickly replaced.

---

Dark Claw fired the two last missiles in his vehicle mode at the Mafia base.  
He transformed to robot mode.

----

Serpentor fired off three plasma bolts at Stronghold.

---

Unitron transformed to jet mode.  Still on the ground, and facing the Mafia 
base, he was able to target the base.  He launched two missiles off at the 
base, taking off into the air.
